queries.sql: SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('country')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('country', 'city', 'sea')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('country', 'city', 'sea', 'state', 'county')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('country', 'state', 'region', 'province', 'district', 'county', 'municipality', 'city', 'town')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('country', 'state', 'region', 'province', 'district', 'county', 'municipality', 'city', 'town', 'village')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('region', 'province', 'district', 'county', 'municipality', 'city', 'town', 'village')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('region', 'province', 'district', 'county', 'municipality', 'city', 'town', 'village', 'quarter', 'hamlet')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('village', 'quarter', 'hamlet', 'neighborhood', 'isolated_dwelling')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('hamlet', 'neighborhood', 'isolated_dwelling')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('neighborhood', 'isolated_dwelling')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'natural' IN ('peak', 'volcano')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND (tags ->> 'tourism' IN ('wilderness_hut')) OR (tags ->> 'waterway' IN ('waterfall'))
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND (tags ->> 'natural' IN ('spring')) OR (tags ->> 'railway' IN ('level_crossing'))
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}'

SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'highway' IN ( 'motorway', 'motorway_link',  'trunk', 'trunk_link',  'primary', 'primary_link',  'secondary', 'secondary_link',  'tertiary', 'tertiary_link', 'unclassified', 'residential')
